introduction.title: Essential Information
introduction.content: To ensure optimal functionality of this platform and deliver quality services, we utilize small data files called cookies on your device. The following policy informs you about their use and your rights.

whatAreCookies.title: What Are Cookies?
whatAreCookies.content: Cookies are text files generated through communication between the website and your browser. These files are stored on your device (computer, tablet, smartphone) and enable our platform to recognize your device during subsequent visits.

cookiePurpose.title: Purpose of Cookie Usage
cookiePurpose.content: Our servers employ cookies to enhance the quality of provided services and tailor content to your preferences. Specifically, we use them for: monitoring website functionality, service optimization, simplifying repeat usage, collecting and analyzing visitor data, providing personalized content, recommending relevant services, and targeted remarketing. By browsing this site, you consent to this processing. Collected information is anonymized and does not lead to your personal identification.

cookieTypes.title: Cookie Categories
cookieTypes.content: From a temporal perspective, we distinguish between temporary cookies (valid only during a session) and permanent cookies (retained until manual deletion or expiration of the set period). By content, we use: essential cookies necessary for proper functioning (such as login credentials), operational cookies for behavioral analysis, functional cookies for feature optimization, and advertising cookies for preference identification. We use advertising cookies exclusively with your consent.

consentManagement.title: Obtaining and Managing Consent
consentManagement.content: Essential cookies necessary for website operation are processed without your explicit consent. Other categories are processed only after consent is granted through the consent window on our site, where you can select which types you agree to.

revokeConsent.title: Revoking Consent
revokeConsent.content: You can modify cookie settings in your browser at any time - you can delete, block, or completely disable them, or limit them to selected categories. Instructions for cookie management can be found in the documentation of individual browsers (Chrome, Edge, Firefox, Safari, and others).

thirdPartyCookies.title: Third-Party Cookies
thirdPartyCookies.content: This site contains links to other platforms (such as social networks). Therefore, cookies may be created during your visit that are not managed by us. You can find the policies for these cookies on the respective third-party sites.

retentionPeriod.title: Retention Period
retentionPeriod.content: We retain cookies for a maximum of 15 months. We retain records of granted consent for 4 years for the purpose of demonstrating compliance with legal obligations.

dataCollection.title: Data Collection
dataCollection.content: We collect information that you provide directly to us, such as when you create an account, subscribe to our services, or contact us. This may include your name, email address, and payment information. We also automatically collect certain information about your device and how you interact with our website.

userRights.title: Your Rights
userRights.content: Under GDPR, you have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal data. You can also object to processing, request data portability, and withdraw consent at any time. To exercise these rights, please contact us using the information below.

contact.title: Contact Information
contact.content: If you have any questions regarding this privacy policy, cookies, or our data processing practices, please contact us through our contact page or email us directly.

cookieUsage.title: Managing Cookie Settings
cookieUsage.content: You have full control over which cookies you accept. You can modify your preferences at any time through our consent window or in your browser settings.
